Notes: Must be male Broo; sacrifice 1 POW; gains Hate (Everything) Passion; may gain Chaos Feature ritual.
Requires 90% in Stealth/Conceal/Tracking and 90% in a combat skill; devour defeated Rune Lord.
Any Broo shaman who is also an initiate of Thed; Thed shamans are also priests.
Leaders of major temples; may perform Rebirth of Chaos.
